reporter_caption.center: COMMONWEALTH EX REL. BARCLAY v. BARCLAY, 268 Pa. Super. 631 (1979)

caption.center: Commonwealth ex rel. Barclay v. Barclay, Appellant.

opinion.posture: Support proceedings. Order entered granting support for minor child, order by FRANKS, J. Defendant appealed. Appeal, No. 1343, April T., 1978, from Court of Common Pleas of Fayette County, D.R. No. 191 of 1978. Argued April 10, 1979.
opinion.attorneys:
Peter U. Hook, for appellant;
James T. Davis, Assistant District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
opinion.panel: Before VAN der VOORT, SPAETH and WATKINS, JJ.
